name: Caffeinator
tagline: Never let your computer fall asleep on you again.
body:
### Welcome to Caffeinator
Caffeinator makes it easy to keep your computer awake when you need it, so you can sit back, relax, and enjoy your content, without needing to constantly lean forward and move your cursor. It is designed to facilitate the needs of power users while maintaining a level of intuitiveness that is approachable to all. All the code is open source on GitHub, so feel free to poke around and see what's going on under the hood. Use the buttons above to download the source code to your computer, or use `git clone`.

Ready to install Caffeinator? Check out the latest releases [here](https://github.com/aaplmath/Caffeinator/releases), and enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
